p: In the context of this review, it is important to highlight that one possible side effect of vaccinations could result in liver damage. Vaccines with the greatest potential, in pandemic situations, are RNA- or DNA-based vaccines [ 55]. These vaccines do not need to be cultured or require fermentation, they avoid risks of working with live pathogens, and can specifically encode key antigens without also coding for other toxins, but they are not without risks [ 55, 56].
